title: harihara sutanE
sahitya:
harihara sutanE ayyappA sharaNam sharaNam sharaNam svAmiyE sharaNam


anupallavi

  aruL nirai vAriyE aDiyavarkkellAm tiruvuDan pugazhum tarum peru vaLLalE


caraNam    shabari malai ninrE karuNaiyE pozhivAi shAstA enum peyar tarittavan nIyanrO 
avaniyil varutunbam anaittaiyum kLaivAi aDi malar paNindana Ananda mUrtiyE
